Title: Black Run (2)
Plot: Boyd is suspended from work after being involved in a hit and run accident while possibly under the influence. While also trying to find out who framed Boyd, the team continue trying to find out if Vine is innocent or not.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Contains violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Terry Alderton,  James Bowers,  Buffy Davis,  Geff Francis,  Michael Gould,  Ian  Groombridge,  Pamela Hardman,  David Hayman,  Michael Palmer,  Diane Parish,  Peter Polycarpou,  Francis Pope,  Robin Soans,  Juli
